TestCase.name: testAggregate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], TMP_0=[$1], TMP_1=[$2], TMP_2=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], TMP_0=[AVG($0)], TMP_1=[SUM($1)], TMP_2=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_AVG(sum$0, count$1) AS TMP_0, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS TMP_1, Final_COUNT(count$3) AS TMP_2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_AVG(a) AS (sum$0, count$1), Partial_SUM(b) AS sum$2, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$3]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(1) AS a, b, c], where=[=(a, 1)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggregateWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(TMP_0=[$0], TMP_1=[$1], TMP_2=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], TMP_0=[AVG($0)], TMP_1=[SUM($1)], TMP_2=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_AVG(sum$0, count$1) AS TMP_0, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS TMP_1, Final_COUNT(count$3) AS TMP_2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_AVG(a) AS (sum$0, count$1), Partial_SUM(b) AS sum$2, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$3]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(1) AS a, b, c], where=[=(a, 1)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggregateWithFilterOnNestedFields
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(TMP_0=[$0], TMP_1=[$1], TMP_2=[$2], TMP_3=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], TMP_0=[AVG($0)], TMP_1=[SUM($1)], TMP_2=[COUNT($2)], TMP_3=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $f3=[$2._1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_AVG(sum$0, count$1) AS TMP_0, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS TMP_1, Final_COUNT(count$3) AS TMP_2, Final_SUM(sum$4) AS TMP_3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_AVG(a) AS (sum$0, count$1), Partial_SUM(b) AS sum$2, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$3, Partial_SUM($f3) AS sum$4]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(1) AS a, b, c, c._1 AS $f3], where=[=(a, 1)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])
